title: 聊天报错error calling function:AttributeError: 'Request' object has no attribute 'is_xhr'
body:
步骤：readme里步骤1和2，到启动app.py步骤后，打开网页，聊天失败`error calling function`后台报错
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70925546/208605995-bc8bbab4-321e-427c-9a53-4e184edb6e2c.png)

```
 * Running on http://192.168.3.201:8808/ (Press CTRL+C to quit)
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:45] "GET / HTTP/1.1" 200 -
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:45] "GET /static/css/normalize.css HTTP/1.1" 304 -
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:45] "GET /static/css/style.css HTTP/1.1" 304 -
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:45] "GET /static/js/jquery.mCustomScrollbar.min.css HTTP/1.1" 304 -
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:45] "GET /static/js/jquery-latest.js HTTP/1.1" 304 -
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:45] "GET /static/js/jquery.min.js HTTP/1.1" 304 -
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:45] "GET /static/js/jquery.mCustomScrollbar.concat.min.js HTTP/1.1" 304 -
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:45] "GET /static/js/index.js HTTP/1.1" 304 -
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:45] "GET /static/res/easybot.png HTTP/1.1" 304 -
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:45] "GET /static/res/hd2.jpg HTTP/1.1" 404 -
Building prefix dict from the default dictionary ...
Loading model from cache C:\Users\73580\AppData\Local\Temp\jieba.cache
Loading model cost 0.461 seconds.
Prefix dict has been built successfully.
[2022-12-20 15:09:49,381] ERROR in app: Exception on /message [POST]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1988, in wsgi_app
    response = self.full_dispatch_request()
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1641, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.handle_user_exception(e)
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1544, in handle_user_exception
    reraise(exc_type, exc_value, tb)
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\_compat.py", line 33, in reraise
    raise value
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1639, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.dispatch_request()
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1625, in dispatch_request
    return self.view_functions[rule.endpoint](**req.view_args)
  File "e:\text\github\deep\chatbot\Chatbot_pytorch\Seq2seqchatbot\web\app.py", line 43, in reply
    res_msg = execute.predict(req_msg)
AttributeError: module 'execute' has no attribute 'predict'
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:09:49] "POST /message HTTP/1.1" 500 -
2022-12-20 15:10:40 - heartbeat
2022-12-20 15:11:40 - heartbeat
2022-12-20 15:12:40 - heartbeat
2022-12-20 15:13:40 - heartbeat
[2022-12-20 15:14:11,415] ERROR in app: Exception on /message [POST]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1988, in wsgi_app
    response = self.full_dispatch_request()
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1641, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.handle_user_exception(e)
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1544, in handle_user_exception
    reraise(exc_type, exc_value, tb)
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\_compat.py", line 33, in reraise
    raise value
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1639, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.dispatch_request()
  File "D:\python3.9.10\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1625, in dispatch_request
    return self.view_functions[rule.endpoint](**req.view_args)
  File "e:\text\github\deep\chatbot\Chatbot_pytorch\Seq2seqchatbot\web\app.py", line 43, in reply
    res_msg = execute.predict(req_msg)
AttributeError: module 'execute' has no attribute 'predict'
192.168.3.201 - - [20/Dec/2022 15:14:11] "POST /message HTTP/1.1" 500 -
```

已确保环境
torch==1.11.0
flask==0.11.1
